title: Furnished one bedroom apartment 33m2
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Prime location! Furnished one bedroom apartment for rent in the 5th district near Luxembourg gardens (brand new furniture to be bought,  tenant can choose furniture, landlord will pay the cost).
TOTAL SPACE 33m2.
A living room + a separate bedroom.
Separate kitchen, bathroom with a bathtub and WC.
Lots of cupboards.
2nd floor.
Safe and quiet. 
Lots of light.
Heating on gas.
1150 euros per month including building charges and water.
Real estate agency fee to be paid on top of the rent (one time fee).
To schedule a visit, please send us an email or contact us on WhatsApp +33663087837
